member.name: IDestinationStreamFactory.GetDestinationStream
member.summary: Gets an empty stream that receives the new version of the file being copied.
member.param: The address of a pointer to the new stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDestinationStreamFactory
member.summary: Exposes a method for manually copying a stream or file before applying changes to properties.
